bean

Class LoginDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • bean.LoginDao

  • public class LoginDao
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods to validate Login, get User's RTI profile and insert new RTI records in the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoginDao() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void closeAll()
      This method is used for closing ResultSet, PreparedStatement and Connection with database if they exist and are open.
      static java.sql.ResultSet getUserProfile(java.lang.String user)
      This method will be used for getting contents of the RTI track for the given user(taken as input in this method).
      static boolean insert(InsertRecord bean)
      This method is used for insertion of new record whose values are provided by user in AdminPage.jsp.
      static boolean validate(LoginBean bean)
      This method is used for checking whether user provided username and password in index.html are correct (as provided in the server database).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoginDao

        public LoginDao()

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public static boolean validate(LoginBean bean)
        This method is used for checking whether user provided username and password in index.html are correct (as provided in the server database).
        Parameters:
        bean - Takes the LoginBean bean as input for getting username and password which are stored in it, taken from login input box in index.html
        Returns:
        boolean - Returns a boolean value. True - if the user and password are matched with the database. False- otherwise

      • insert

        public static boolean insert(InsertRecord bean)
        This method is used for insertion of new record whose values are provided by user in AdminPage.jsp.
        Parameters:
        bean - Takes InsertRecord.java Bean as input for passing values of the record stored from AdminPage.jsp
        Returns:
        boolean - Returns boolean value. True:if record is inserted properly in the database. False:If there is an error in connection or insertion of new record in database.

      • getUserProfile

        public static java.sql.ResultSet getUserProfile(java.lang.String user)
        This method will be used for getting contents of the RTI track for the given user(taken as input in this method). This returns ResultSet of the profile table once a successful connection is established with the user's table in database.
        Parameters:
        user - Takes user(String) name as an input for connecting to the user specific database
        Returns:
        ResultSet - returns the ResultSet containing the contents of the profile table of the user

      • closeAll

        public static void closeAll()
        This method is used for closing ResultSet, PreparedStatement and Connection with database if they exist and are open. This method is useful for closing all open connections with the database once the user is done retrieving informations/values from ResultSet
